1111100011101010 0010011000000011 0 -> sum: 0001111011101101, cout: 1
0101111101010110 1111011000010100 0 -> sum: 0101010101101010, cout: 1
1011001111011101 0010110100010011 1 -> sum: 1110000011110001, cout: 0
1000000100100111 0011111111001001 1 -> sum: 1100000011110001, cout: 0
1100110011111100 1001010000100111 0 -> sum: 0110000100100011, cout: 1
1001100000011100 1000111100001100 1 -> sum: 0010011100101001, cout: 1
